sourcesContent:
import {useState} from "react"; function TodoForm(){ const [qty, setQty] = useState(''); const [product, setProduct] = useState(''); const [lists, setList] = useState([]); const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // 👈️ prevent page refresh if(qty == '' && product == ''){ alert("Boş bırakılamaz"); }else{ setList((lists) => [...lists, { qty: qty, product: product }]); document.getElementById("todoForm").reset(); } }; const listingItems = lists.map((list) => {list.product} x{list.qty} ); return(

Todo List Form

setProduct(event.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="What product do you need?" />
setQty(event.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="How many are needed ?" />

Todo List

{listingItems}
PRODUCT NAME QTY
) } export default TodoForm;
